description.brazilian: Torne-se viciado em álcool.
description.english: Become addicted to alcohol.
description.french: Devenir alcoolique.
description.german: Werde alkoholabhängig.
description.italian: Sviluppa una dipendenza dall’alcool.
description.schinese: 沉迷于饮酒
description.spanish: Vuélvete adicto al alcohol.

description.brazilian: Não durma por dois dias e duas noites.
description.english: Don't sleep for two days and nights.
description.french: Ne pas dormir pendant deux jours et nuits.
description.german: Schlafe nicht für zwei Tage und zwei Nächte.
description.italian: Rinuncia al sonno per due giorni e due notti.
description.polish: Nie śpij przez dwa dni i dwie noce.
description.russian: Не спите два дня и две ночи.
description.schinese: 连续两天不睡觉
description.spanish: Duerme poco durante 2 noches y 2 días.

description.brazilian: Fique a ponto de explodir por dois dias.
description.czech: Buď dva dny přežraný k prasknutí.
description.english: Be stuffed to bursting for two days.
description.french: Être repu pendant deux jours.
description.german: Überfresse dich zwei Tage lang.
description.italian: Abbuffati fino a scoppiare per due giorni.
description.polish: Czuj się przejedzony przez dwa dni.
description.schinese: 连续两天吃撑
description.spanish: Permanece saciado durante 2 días.
description.turkish: İki gün tıka basa tok gez.

description.brazilian: Passe fome durante três dias.
description.english: Starve for three days.
description.french: Être affamé pendant trois jours.
description.german: Hungere drei Tage lang.
description.italian: Soffri la fame per tre giorni.
description.schinese: 连续饿三天
description.spanish: Pasa hambre durante 3 días.

description.brazilian: Leia vinte livros.
description.english: Read twenty books.
description.french: Lire vingt livres.
description.german: Lies 20 Bücher.
description.italian: Leggi 20 libri.
description.schinese: 阅读20本书
description.spanish: Lee 20 libros.

description.brazilian: Crie quinze tipos de poções.
description.english: Brew fifteen types of potion
description.french: Préparer quinze potions différentes.
description.german: Braue 15 unterschiedliche Tränke.
description.italian: Prepara 15 tipi di pozione.
description.russian: Сварите пятнадцать видов снадобий и зелий.
description.schinese: 调制15种不同的药剂
description.spanish: Elabora 15 tipos de pociones.

description.brazilian: Mate vinte inimigos furtivamente.
description.english: Kill twenty enemies by stealth
description.french: Tuer furtivement vingt ennemis.
description.german: Töte 20 Gegner aus dem Hinterhalt.
description.italian: Elimina 20 nemici furtivamente.
description.schinese: 暗杀20个敌人
description.spanish: Mata a 20 enemigos con sigilo.

description.brazilian: Cace cinquenta animais.
description.english: Bag fifty game animals.
description.french: Réussir cinquante prises à la chasse.
description.german: Erlege 50 Wildtiere.
description.italian: Caccia 50 capi di selvaggina.
description.schinese: 猎杀50只动物
description.spanish: Caza 50 animales.

description.brazilian: Maximize Oratória.
description.english: Level up Speech to maximum.
description.french: Atteindre le niveau maximal d'Éloquence.
description.german: Bring „Redekunst“ auf die maximale Stufe.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello massimo di dialogo.
description.schinese: 升满口才等级
description.spanish: Sube el nivel de diálogo al máximo.

description.brazilian: Seja popular em todas as cidades e vilarejos.
description.czech: Buď oblíbený v každé vesnici a městě.
description.english: Be popular in every town and village.
description.french: Être bien reçu dans chaque ville et village.
description.german: Werde in jeder Stadt und in jedem Dorf geschätzt.
description.italian: Acquista fama in ogni città e villaggio.
description.polish: Zdobądź popularność w każdym mieście i wiosce.
description.russian: Станьте популярным в каждом городке и в каждой деревне.
description.schinese: 在所有城镇都享有极高的人气
description.spanish: Hazte popular en todos los pueblos y aldeas.

description.brazilian: Complete todas as missões.
description.english: Complete all quests.
description.french: Terminer l'ensemble des quêtes.
description.german: Schließ alle Quests ab.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni.
description.schinese: 完成所有任务
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones.

description.brazilian: Não mate ninguém durante toda a missão principal (exceto Nanico).
description.czech: Splň všechny hlavní questy, aniž bys kohokoli zabil (kromě Prcka).
description.english: Don't kill anyone during main quest line (except Runt).
description.french: Ne tuer personne pendant l'histoire principale (sauf le Haingre).
description.german: Töte niemanden in der Hauptgeschichte (außer Wicht).
description.italian: Non uccidere nessuno nella storia principale (tranne Runt).
description.polish: Nie zabijaj nikogo w trakcie głównej linii gry (oprócz Śmierdziela).
description.russian: Не убивайте никого в заданиях основного сюжета (кроме Коротышки).
description.schinese: 在主线剧情中不杀一个人（除了矮子）
description.spanish: No mates a nadie durante la línea de misión principal (excepto a Tapón).
description.turkish: Ana görevler boyunca kimseyi öldürme (Bücür hariç).

description.brazilian: Mate 200 pessoas.
description.english: Kill 200 people.
description.french: Tuer 200 personnes.
description.german: Töte 200 Menschen.
description.italian: Uccidi 200 persone.
description.schinese: 杀了200人
description.spanish: Mata a 200 personas.

description.brazilian: Você descobriu todas as localidades do mapa.
description.english: Discover all locations on the map.
description.french: Découvrir tous les emplacements de la carte.
description.german: Entdecke alle Orte auf der Karte.
description.italian: Scopri tutti i luoghi sulla mappa.
description.schinese: 发现地图上所有的地点
description.spanish: Descubre todos los lugares del mapa.

description.brazilian: Vença a corrida de cavalos de Talmberk.
description.english: Win the Talmberg horse race.
description.french: Remporter la course de chevaux de Talmberg.
description.german: Gewinne das Talmberger Pferderennen.
description.italian: Trionfa nella corsa di cavalli a Talmberg.
description.schinese: 赢得在塔尔木堡的赛马
description.spanish: Gana la carrera de caballos de Talmberk.

description.brazilian: Caminhe mais de 50 Km.
description.czech: Nachoď víc než 50 km po svých.
description.english: Walk more than 50 Km.
description.french: Marcher sur plus de 50 km.
description.german: Gehe mehr als 50 km.
description.italian: Percorri a piedi più di 50 chilometri.
description.schinese: 走50公里
description.spanish: Camina más de 50 km.

description.brazilian: Encontre todos os santuários e cruzes conciliatórias.
description.czech: Najdi všechna boží muka a smírčí kříže.
description.english: Find all wayside shrines and conciliatory crosses.
description.french: Trouver tous les sanctuaires et croix mémoriales.
description.german: Finde alle Bildstöcke und Sühnekreuze.
description.italian: Trova tutti i sacrari votivi e le croci espiatorie.
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie boże męki i krzyże pokutne.
description.russian: Найдите все часовни и примирительные кресты.
description.schinese: 发现所有的路边神龛和十字架
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los santuarios en el camino y cruces de redención.
description.turkish: Tüm yol kenarı türbelerini ve anıt haçlarını bul.

description.brazilian: Furte coisas com um valor total de 30.000 moedas.
description.czech: Ukradni věci v celkové hodnotě 30 000 grošů.
description.english: Steal things with a total value of 30,000 Groschen.
description.french: Dérober pour 30 000 groschen d'objets.
description.german: Stiehl Dinge im Gesamtwert von 30.000 Groschen.
description.italian: Ruba oggetti per un valore totale di 30.000 groschen.
description.polish: Ukradnij rzeczy o wspólnej wartości 30,000 groszy.
description.russian: Украдите вещи общей стоимостью в 30 000 грошей.
description.schinese: 累计偷走价值30000块钱的物品
description.spanish: Roba objetos por un valor total de 30 000 groschen.

description.brazilian: Atinja o nível máximo.
description.english: Reach maximum level.
description.french: Atteindre le niveau maximal.
description.german: Erreiche die maximale Stufe.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello massimo.
description.schinese: 升至满级
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel máximo.

description.brazilian: Realize 100 combos em combate.
description.english: Carry out 100 combos in combat.
description.french: Effectuer 100 combos en combat.
description.german: Führe 100 Kombos im Kampf aus.
description.italian: Esegui 100 combo in combattimento.
description.schinese: 在战斗中做出超过100次连击
description.spanish: Ejecuta 100 combos en combate.

description.brazilian: Mate 50 inimigos com tiros na cabeça.
description.english: Kill 50 enemies with headshots.
description.french: Tuer 50 ennemis d'un tir à la tête.
description.german: Töte 50 Gegner mit Kopfschüssen.
description.italian: Elimina 50 nemici con colpi alla testa.
description.schinese: 以爆头的方式杀死50个敌人
description.spanish: Mata a 50 enemigos con disparos en la cabeza.

description.brazilian: Poupe 2.000 moedas pechinchando.
description.english: Save 2000 Groschen by haggling.
description.french: Économiser 2 000 groschen en marchandant.
description.german: Spare 2.000 Groschen durch Feilschen.
description.italian: Risparmia 2000 groschen con le trattative.
description.schinese: 讨价还价省下2000块钱
description.spanish: Ahorra 2000 groschen regateando.

description.brazilian: Acumule 5.000 moedas.
description.english: Hoard 5,000 Groschen.
description.french: Amasser 5 000 groschen.
description.german: Horte 5.000 Groschen.
description.italian: Accumula 5000 groschen.
description.schinese: 囤积5000块钱
description.spanish: Acumula montones de dinero.

description.brazilian: Passe três dias na prisão.
description.english: Spend three days in prison.
description.french: Passer trois jours en prison.
description.german: Verbringe drei Tage im Kerker.
description.italian: Trascorri tre giorni in prigione.
description.schinese: 在监狱呆3天
description.spanish: Pasa 3 días en prisión.

description.brazilian: Colete 10.000 ervas.
description.english: Collect 10,000 herbs.
description.french: Collecter 10 000 herbes.
description.german: Sammle 10.000 Kräuter.
description.italian: Raccogli 10.000 erbe.
description.schinese: 采集10000棵草药
description.spanish: Recoge 10 000 hierbas.

description.brazilian: Ganhe 1.000 moedas no jogo de dados.
description.english: Win 1,000 Groschen in the dice minigame.
description.french: Remporter 1 000 groschen au mini-jeu de dés.
description.german: Gewinne 1.000 Groschen im Würfel-Minispiel.
description.italian: Vinci 1000 groschen nel minigioco dei dadi.
description.polish: Wygraj 1000 groszy w mini grze w kości.
description.schinese: 在赌博小游戏里赌赢1000块钱
description.spanish: Gana 1000 groschen en el minijuego de los dados.
description.turkish: Zar atma mini oyununda 1,000 Groşen kazan.

description.brazilian: Complete a primeira missão.
description.english: Complete the first quest.
description.french: Accomplir la première quête.
description.german: Schließ die erste Quest ab.
description.italian: Completa la prima missione.
description.schinese: 完成第一个任务
description.spanish: Completa la primera misión.

description.brazilian: Salve Theresa dos Cumanos.
description.english: Save Theresa from the Cumans.
description.french: Sauver Thérèse des Coumans.
description.german: Rette Theresa vor den Kumanen.
description.italian: Salva Theresa dai cumani.
description.schinese: 从库曼人的手中救出特丽萨
description.spanish: Salva a Theresa de los cumanos.

description.brazilian: Junte-se à guarnição de Sir Radzig.
description.english: Join Sir Radzig's garrison.
description.french: Rejoindre la garnison du seigneur Radzig.
description.german: Schließ dich Herrn Radzigs Garnison an.
description.italian: Unisciti alla guarnigione di ser Radzig.
description.polish: Przyłącz się do drużyny pana Radzika.
description.schinese: 加入拉德季大人的卫戍部队
description.spanish: Únete a la guarnición de sir Radzig.

description.brazilian: Salve Lorde Capon dos Cumanos.
description.english: Save Lord Capon from the Cumans.
description.french: Sauver le seigneur Capon des Coumans.
description.german: Rette Herrn Capon vor den Kumanen.
description.italian: Salva ser Capon dai cumani.
description.schinese: 从库曼人的手中救出少主卡蓬
description.spanish: Salva a lord Capon de los cumanos.

description.brazilian: Salve Ruivo dos bandidos.
description.english: Save Ginger from the bandits.
description.french: Sauver Rouquin des bandits.
description.german: Rette Rotschopf vor den Banditen.
description.italian: Salva Ginger dai banditi.
description.schinese: 从强盗的手中救出金杰
description.spanish: Salva a Panocha de los bandidos.

description.brazilian: Mate Nanico.
description.english: Kill Runt.
description.french: Tuer le Haingre.
description.german: Töte Wicht.
description.italian: Uccidi Runt.
description.schinese: 杀掉矮子
description.spanish: Mata a Tapón.

description.brazilian: Torne-se um monge.
description.english: Become a monk.
description.french: Devenir moine.
description.german: Werde Mönch.
description.italian: Diventa un monaco.
description.schinese: 变成一个僧侣
description.spanish: Hazte monje.

description.brazilian: Descubra quem é seu verdadeiro pai.
description.czech: Zjisti, kdo je tvůj pravý otec.
description.english: Find out who your real father is.
description.french: Découvrir qui est votre véritable père.
description.german: Finde heraus, wer dein richtiger Vater ist.
description.italian: Scopri l'identità del tuo vero padre.
description.polish: Dowiedz się, kto jest twoim prawdziwym ojcem.
description.schinese: 知道你亲生父亲是谁
description.spanish: Averigua quién es tu verdadero padre.

description.brazilian: Conquiste o acampamento inimigo em Vraník.
description.english: Conquer the enemy camp in Vranik.
description.french: Vaincre le campement ennemi de Vranik.
description.german: Erobere das feindliche Lager in Wranik.
description.italian: Conquista l'accampamento nemico a Vranik.
description.schinese: 打下弗拉尼克的敌方营地
description.spanish: Conquista el campamento enemigo en Vraník.

description.brazilian: Complete todos os objetivos opcionais na missão Cerco.
description.czech: Splň všechny nepovinné úkoly při obléhání Talmberka.
description.english: Complete all Optional Objectives in Siege quest
description.french: Réussir tous les objectifs facultatifs dans la quête du Siège.
description.german: Schließ alle optionalen Aufgaben in der Quest „Belagerung“ ab.
description.italian: Completa tutti gli obiettivi opzionali nella missione Assedio.
description.polish: Osiągnij wszystkie opcjonalne cele w zadaniu Obleganie.
description.russian: Завершите все побочные задачи в задании "Осада".
description.schinese: 在围城任务中完成所有可选目标
description.spanish: Completa todos los objetivos opcionales en la misión Asedio.
description.turkish: Kuşatma görevindeki tüm İsteğe Bağlı Hedefleri tamamla

description.brazilian: Complete a história principal.
description.english: Complete the main story line.
description.french: Finir l'histoire principale.
description.german: Schließ die Hauptgeschichte ab.
description.italian: Completa la storia principale.
description.schinese: 完成全部主线任务
description.spanish: Completa la historia principal.

description.brazilian: Seja preso em Skalice.
description.czech: Nech se zavřít do vězení ve Skalici.
description.english: Get jailed in Skalitz.
description.french: Être enfermé dans les geôles de Skalice.
description.german: Werde in Skalitz eingesperrt.
description.italian: Fatti arrestare a Skalica.
description.schinese: 被关进斯卡里茨的监狱
description.spanish: Haz que te encarcelen en Skalice.

description.brazilian: Embebede-se com o Padre Godwin.
description.english: Get drunk with Father Godwin.
description.french: Vous enivrer avec le père Godwin.
description.german: Betrinke dich mit Pater Godwin.
description.italian: Ubriacati insieme a padre Godwin.
description.schinese: 和古德温神父一起喝得烂醉
description.spanish: Emborráchate con el padre Godwin.

description.brazilian: Cure todos os doentes em Mrchojedy.
description.english: Heal all the sick in Merhojed.
description.french: Soigner tous les malades de Merhojed.
description.german: Heile alle Kranken in Merhojed.
description.italian: Cura tutti i malati a Merhojed.
description.schinese: 治好莫霍杰德所有的病人
description.spanish: Cura a todos los enfermos de Mrchojedy.

description.brazilian: Corteje Theresa.
description.english: Court Theresa.
description.french: Faire la cour à Thérèse.
description.german: Umwerbe Theresa.
description.italian: Corteggia Theresa.
description.schinese: 追求特丽莎
description.spanish: Corteja a Theresa.

description.brazilian: Corteje Dama Stephanie.
description.english: Court Lady Stephanie.
description.french: Faire la cour à Dame Thifaine.
description.german: Umwerbe Herrin Stefanie.
description.italian: Corteggia la signora Stephanie.
description.schinese: 追求斯蒂芬妮夫人
description.spanish: Corteja a lady Stephanie.

description.brazilian: Traia seus amigos na missão Irmãos do Cadafalso.
description.czech: Zraď své kamarády v questu Šibeniční bratři.
description.english: Betray your friends in the Gallows Brothers quest.
description.french: Trahir vos amis lors de la quête Frères de potence.
description.german: Hintergehe deine Freunde in der Quest „Galgenbrüder“.
description.italian: Tradisci i tuoi amici nella missione Fratelli di forca.
description.polish: Zdradź swych kumpli w zadaniu „Bracia na szubienicy”.
description.russian: Предайте своих друзей в задании "Братья по виселице".
description.schinese: 在任务《难兄难弟》里背叛你的朋友
description.spanish: Traiciona a tus amigos en la misión Hermanos de cadalso.
description.turkish: Asılacak Kardeşler görevinde arkadaşlarına ihanet et.

description.brazilian: Descubra o passado de Erik.
description.english: Find out about Erik's past.
description.french: Mettre en lumière le passé d'Éric.
description.german: Komme hinter Eriks Vergangenheit.
description.italian: Scopri la verità sul passato di Erik.
description.schinese: 了解到埃里克的过去
description.spanish: Averigua el pasado de Erik.

description.brazilian: Torne-se o Mestre Caçador de Talmberk.
description.english: Become the Talmberg Huntsman.
description.french: Devenir le chasseur de Talmberg.
description.german: Werde der Jägermeister von Talmberg.
description.italian: Diventa il mastro cacciatore di Talmberg.
description.schinese: 成为塔尔木堡的猎人
description.spanish: Conviértete en el cazador de Talmberk.

description.brazilian: Complete a missão Barão Ladrão.
description.english: Complete Robber Baron quest.
description.french: Accomplir la quête du baron-bandit.
description.german: Schließ die Quest „Räuberbaron“ ab.
description.italian: Completa la missione Un nobile brigante.
description.schinese: 完成任务“贵族强盗”
description.spanish: Completa la misión Barón ladrón.

description.brazilian: Sabote todas as três execuções.
description.english: Sabotage all three executions.
description.french: Saboter les trois exécutions.
description.german: Sabotiere alle drei Hinrichtungen in der Quest „Wenn alle Stricke reißen“.
description.italian: Sventa le tre esecuzioni.
description.schinese: 三次劫法场
description.spanish: Sabotea las 3 ejecuciones planeadas.

description.brazilian: Dance com o Diabo.
description.english: Dance with the Devil.
description.french: Danser avec le Diable.
description.german: Tanze mit dem Teufel.
description.italian: Danza con il diavolo.
description.schinese: 与恶魔共舞
description.spanish: Bailar con el Diablo

description.brazilian: Mantenha o celibato e complete o jogo como virgem.
description.czech: Dodržuj celibát a dohraj hru jako panic.
description.english: Stay celibate and complete the entire game as a virgin.
description.french: Rester célibataire et terminer le jeu vierge.
description.german: Bleibe keusch und schließ das ganze Spiel als Jungfrau ab.
description.italian: Votati alla castità e resta vergine fino al termine del gioco.
description.polish: Pozostań w celibacie do końca gry i zakończ ją jako prawiczek.
description.russian: Соблюдайте целибат и завершите всю игру, оставшись девственником.
description.schinese: 在打通整个游戏之后依然是纯洁之身
description.spanish: Mantente célibe y completa el juego con tu virginidad intacta.
description.turkish: Nefsine hâkim olup tüm oyunu bakir olarak bitir.

description.brazilian: Termine o jogo no modo Extremo.
description.english: Finish the game in Hardcore Mode.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode Hardcore.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel im Hardcore-Modus ab.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità estrema.
description.schinese: 已极难模式通关游戏
description.spanish: Acaba el juego en modo Extremo.

description.brazilian: Termine o jogo no modo Extremo com todas as vantagens negativas.
description.czech: Dohraj hru v Hardcore módu se všemi negativními perky.
description.english: Finish the game in Hardcore Mode with all negative perks.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode Hardcore avec tous les atouts négatifs.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel im Hardcore-Modus mit allen negativen Spezialisierungen ab.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità estrema con tutti i talenti negativi.
description.russian: Пройдите игру в жестком режиме, получив все отрицательные умения.
description.schinese: 在选择全部的负面技能的条件下，以极难模式通关游戏
description.spanish: Acaba el juego en modo Extremo con todas las ventajas negativas.
description.turkish: Oyunu tüm olumsuz özelliklerle birlikte Ölümcül Kip'te bitir.

displayName.spanish: Su reino no ha venido a nosotros

description.brazilian: Morra pela primeira vez no modo Extremo.
description.english: Die for the first time in Hardcore Mode.
description.french: Mourir pour la première fois en mode Hardcore.
description.german: Stirb erstmalig im Hardcore-Modus.
description.italian: Muori per la prima volta in modalità estrema.
description.polish: Zgiń po raz pierwszy w trybie hardcore.
description.russian: Умрите в первый раз в жестком режиме.
description.schinese: 在极难模式中第一次死亡
description.spanish: Muere por primera vez en modo Extremo.

description.brazilian: Assegure a reconstrução de Přibyslavice.
description.english: Ensure the renewal of Pribyslavitz.
description.french: Assurer la réhabilitation de Pribyslavice.
description.german: Sorge für eine Erneuerung von Pribyslawitz.
description.italian: Garantisci la ricostruzione di Pribyslavitz.
description.schinese: 使普拉比西拉维奇重获新生
description.spanish: Asegúrate de que Přibyslavice sea reconstruida.

description.brazilian: Reconstrua Přibyslavice sem saber ler.
description.czech: Obnov celé Přibyslavice, aniž bys uměl číst.
description.english: Renew the whole of Pribyslavitz without being able to read.
description.french: Réhabiliter entièrement Pribyslavice sans savoir lire.
description.german: Erneuere ganz Pribyslawitz, ohne des Lesens kundig zu sein.
description.italian: Ricostruisci completamente Pribyslavitz senza saper leggere.
description.russian: Восстановите всю Прибыславицу, не умея при этом читать.
description.schinese: 在大字不识的情况下使普拉比西拉维奇重获新生
description.spanish: Reconstruye Přibyslavice sin saber leer.
description.turkish: Tüm Pribyslavitz'i okuma yazma bilmeden yenile.

description.brazilian: Faça 2.000 moedas por dia em Přibyslavice.
description.english: Make 2,000 Groschen a day from Pribyslavitz.
description.french: Avoir un revenu de 2 000 groschen par jour en provenance de Pribyslavice.
description.german: Nimm in Pribyslawitz 2.000 Groschen pro Tag ein.
description.italian: Ricava 2000 groschen al giorno da Pribyslavitz.
description.polish: Wypracuj dochód 2000 groszy na dzień w Przybysławicach.
description.russian: Заставьте Прибыславицу зарабатывать 2 000 грошей в день.
description.schinese: 在普拉比西拉维奇日入2000格罗申
description.spanish: Gana 2000 groschen al día en Přibyslavice.

description.brazilian: Convide Fritz e Matthew a Přibyslavice.
description.czech: Pozvi Fricka s Matušem do Přibyslavic.
description.english: Invite Fritz and Matthew to Pribyslavitz.
description.french: Inviter Fritz et Matthieu à Pribyslavice.
description.german: Lade Fritz und Matthäus nach Pribyslawitz ein.
description.italian: Invita Fritz e Matthew a Pribyslavitz.
description.polish: Zaproś Frycka i Mateusza do Przybysławic.
description.russian: Пригласите Фрицека и Матуша в Прибыславицу.
description.schinese: 邀请弗利兹与马修到普拉比西拉维奇
description.spanish: Invita a Fritz y Matthew a Přibyslavice.
description.turkish: Fritz ve Matthew'u Pribyslavitz'e davet et.

description.brazilian: Obtenha um conjunto completo de armadura do Torneio de Rataje.
description.czech: Získej kompletní sadu brnění z ratajského turnaje.
description.english: Get a complete set of armour from the Rattay tourney.
description.french: Obtenez une panoplie d'armure complète du tournoi de Rattay.
description.german: Erhalte beim Rattayer Turnier ein vollständiges Rüstungsset.
description.italian: Ottieni l’armatura completa del torneo di Rattay.
description.polish: Zdobądź wszystkie elementy zbroi na Ratajskim Turnieju.
description.russian: Получите полный набор доспехов после турнира в Ратае.
description.schinese: 从拉泰比武场获得全套盔甲
description.spanish: Consigue un conjunto completo de armadura del torneo de Rataje.
description.turkish: Rattay turnuvasından tam bir zırh takımı edin.

description.brazilian: Capon terá êxito mesmo você o tendo enviado com uma terrível brotoeja.
description.czech: Ptáček uspěje, i když jsi ho poslal s vyrážkou.
description.english: Capon will succeed, even though you sent him off with a nasty rash.
description.french: Capon parviendra à ses fins, même s'il est rentré chez lui avec de terribles rougeurs.
description.german: Herrn Hans’ Vorhaben muss trotz seines schlimmen Ausschlags von Erfolg gekrönt sein.
description.italian: Capon ce la farà, nonostante il brutto sfogo cutaneo.
description.polish: Ptaszek odniesie sukces, chociaż wysłałeś go z okropną wysypką.
description.russian: Птачек преуспеет даже несмотря на то, что вы отказали ему с отвратительной поспешностью.
description.schinese: 哪怕你坑了卡蓬，让他长了疹子，他还是会成功的
description.spanish: Capon tendrá éxito, aunque lo has despachado con un repugnante sarpullido.
description.turkish: Onu pis bir kızarıklıkla yollamış olsan da Capon başarılı olacak.

description.brazilian: Tudo tem que acontecer de acordo com o plano de Sir Hans.
description.czech: Všechno musí jít podle Ptáčkova plánu.
description.english: Everything has to go according to Sir Hans' plan.
description.french: Tout doit se passer conformément au plan du seigneur Hans.
description.german: Alles muss ganz nach Herrn Hans’ Plan verlaufen.
description.italian: Tutto deve procedere secondo il piano di ser Hans.
description.polish: Wszystko przebiegło zgodnie z planem pana Jana.
description.russian: Все должно происходить по плану пана Яна.
description.schinese: 一切都是按照卡蓬大人的计划进行的
description.spanish: Todo va de acuerdo con el plan de sir Hans.
description.turkish: Her şey Sör Hans'ın planına göre ilerlemeli.

displayName.russian: Я могу бросить в любой момент

description.brazilian: O que importa são os dados; o resto se resolverá por si só.
description.czech: Hlavní jsou kostky a ten zbytek nějak dopadne.
description.english: Dice are most important, the rest will work itself out somehow.
description.french: Les dés sont votre vie, le reste peut attendre.
description.german: Die Würfel sind das Wichtigste, der Rest ergibt sich irgendwie von selbst.
description.italian: I dadi sono l’unica cosa importante, il resto si sistemerà.
description.polish: Najważniejsze są kości, reszta sama się jakoś ułoży.
description.russian: Кости - самое важное. Остальное сработает как-нибудь само.
description.schinese: 玩骰子最重要了，其他的事情总会自己解决的
description.spanish: Los dedos son lo que más importa, el resto se arreglará solo de alguna manera.
description.turkish: En önemlisi zarlardır, gerisi bir şekilde yolunu bulur.

description.brazilian: Recupere o colar de Capon sem a permissão de ninguém.
description.czech: Získej Ptáčkův šperk, aniž by tě k němu někdo pustil.
description.english: Get back Capon's necklace without permission from anyone.
description.french: Reprenez le collier de Capon sans demander la permission à quiconque.
description.german: Beschaffe Herrn Hans’ Kette wieder, ohne irgendjemanden zu fragen.
description.italian: Recupera la collana di Capon senza chiederne il permesso.
description.polish: Odzyskaj naszyjnik pana Ptaszka, nie pytając nikogo o zgodę.
description.russian: Верните ожерелье Птачека, не спрашивая ни у кого разрешения.
description.schinese: 不经过任何人的允许，要回卡蓬的项链
description.spanish: Recupera el collar de Capon sin pedir permiso.
description.turkish: Capon'un kolyesini, kimseye görünmeden geri al.

description.brazilian: Pense em mais formas de assombrar os aldeões de Ledečko além das que o charlatão lhe disse.
description.czech: Udělej pro vystrašení Ledečka víc, než ti řekl šarlatán.
description.english: Think up even more ways to haunt the Ledetchko villagers than the charlatan told you.
description.french: Hantez les villageois de Ledetchko par d'autres moyens que ceux du charlatan.
description.german: Lass dir selbst etwas einfallen, um den Dörflern in Ledetschko noch mehr Angst einzujagen.
description.italian: Inventa nuovi modi per terrorizzare Ledetchko, oltre quelli suggeriti dal ciarlatano.
description.polish: Wymyśl inne sposoby straszenia ludzi w Ledeczku niż te, podane przez szarlatana.
description.russian: Придумайте больше способов запугать жителей Ледечко, чем поведал вам шарлатан.
description.schinese: 想出更多闹鬼吓唬拉迪亚茨克村民的方法，得比那个江湖骗子教得还要多
description.spanish: Piensa más formas de atemorizar a los lugareños de Ledečko de las que te contó el charlatán.
description.turkish: Ledetchko köylülerine musallat olmak için, şarlatanın sana söylediklerinden farklı yollar bul.

description.brazilian: Assegure a salvação eterna para o infeliz carvoeiro Lev.
description.czech: Postarej se o spásu duše nebohého uhlíře.
description.english: Ensure eternal salvation for the wretched charcoal-burner, Lev.
description.french: Veillez à ce que Lev, le misérable charbonnier, accède au salut éternel.
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass dem armseligen Köhler Lev ewige Erlösung zuteilwird.
description.italian: Assicura la salvezza eterna al povero carbonaio Lev.
description.polish: Dopilnuj, aby węglarz Leon dostąpił wiecznego odkupienia win.
description.russian: Подарите вечное искупление бедному углежогу Леву.
description.schinese: 确保不幸的烧炭工列夫得到永恒的救赎
description.spanish: Asegura la salvación eterna del desgraciado carbonero, Lev.
description.turkish: Perişan kömürcü Lev için ebedi kurtuluşu sağla.

displayName.italian: Una sepoltura cristiana ma non troppo

description.brazilian: Conceda um descanso tranquilo à alma do infeliz carvoeiro Lev.
description.czech: Postarej se o věčný klid nebohého uhlíře.
description.english: Grant peaceful rest to the soul of the wretched charcoal-burner, Lev.
description.french: Accordez le repos à l'âme de Lev, le misérable charbonnier.
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass die Seele des armseligen Köhlers Lev ihren Frieden findet.
description.italian: Assicurati che l’anima del povero carbonaio Lev riposi in pace.
description.russian: Позаботьтесь об упокое души бедного углежога Лева.
description.schinese: 为不幸的烧炭工列夫的灵魂带来安息
description.spanish: Asegúrate de que el desgraciado carbonero, Lev, descansa en paz.
description.turkish: Perişan kömürcü Lev'in ruhuna huzurlu bir dinlenme yeri bahşet.

description.brazilian: Rastreie os invasores que atacaram a fazenda.
description.english: Track down the raiders who attacked the farm.
description.french: Remonter la piste des incendiaires qui ont attaqué la ferme.
description.german: Spüre die Halunken auf, die den Bauernhof angegriffen haben.
description.italian: Rintraccia i furfanti che hanno attaccato la fattoria.
description.schinese: 追踪袭击了农场的入侵者
description.spanish: Seguir el rastro de los asaltantes que atacaron la granja.

description.brazilian: Persuada Kuno a atacar o moinho imediatamente.
description.czech: Přesvědč Kuna, aby na mlýn zaútočil ihned.
description.english: Persuade Kuno to attack the mill right away.
description.french: Persuader Kuno d'attaquer le moulin tout de suite.
description.german: Überzeuge Herrn Kuno davon, die Mühle sogleich anzugreifen.
description.italian: Convinci Kuno ad attaccare il mulino senza attendere.
description.polish: Przekonaj Kuno do natychmiastowego ataku na młyn.
description.russian: Уговори Куно немедленно напасть на мельницу.
description.schinese: 说服库诺立刻进攻磨坊
description.spanish: Convencer a Kuno para que ataque el molino de inmediato.
description.turkish: Kuno'yu değirmene saldırması içim ikna et.

displayName.czech: Na mou duši, na psí uši
displayName.french: Croix de bois croix de fer

description.brazilian: Mantenha sua palavra a qualquer custo.
description.czech: Dodrž své slovo za každou cenu.
description.english: Keep your word at any cost.
description.french: Tenir parole à tout prix.
description.german: Halte dein Versprechen um jeden Preis.
description.italian: Mantieni la tua parola a ogni costo.
description.schinese: 不计代价遵守约定
description.spanish: Cumplir tu palabra a toda costa.
description.turkish: Ne pahasına olursa olsun sözünü tut.

description.brazilian: Deixe que Jakey reflita sobre o erro de seus modos.
description.czech: Nech Kubajse, aby si všechno pěkně rozmyslel.
description.english: Leave Jakey to consider the error of his ways.
description.french: Laisser Jakey méditer sur ses erreurs.
description.german: Befreie Jackel nicht, damit er über seine Missetat nachdenken kann.
description.italian: Abbandona Jakey a riflettere sui suoi errori.
description.polish: Nie uwalniaj Jacka, niech się zastanowi nad popełnionymi błędami.
description.russian: Оставь Приблуду размышлять об ошибках прошлого.
description.schinese: 留下杰克反思错误
description.spanish: Dejar que Jakey medite lo erróneo de su comportamiento.
description.turkish: Nerede yanlış yaptığını anlaması için Jakey'i yalnız bıraktın.

description.brazilian: Desperte o senso de honra do mercenário.
description.english: Arouse the mercenary's sense of honour.
description.french: Réveiller le sens de l'honneur du mercenaire.
description.german: Appelliere erfolgreich an Herrn Kunos Ehre.
description.italian: Ridesta il senso dell’onore del mercenario.
description.schinese: 激起佣兵的荣誉感
description.spanish: Invoca el sentido del honor del mercenario.

description.brazilian: O anel de Baco voltou ao seu dono original.
description.czech: Bakchův prsten doputoval zpět ke svému prvnímu majiteli.
description.english: The Ring of Bacchus made its way back to its original owner.
description.french: L'anneau de Bacchus est revenu à son propriétaire d'origine.
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass der Ring des Bacchus wieder in den Besitz von Herrn Kuno gelangt.
description.italian: L'anello di Bacco è tornato al suo legittimo proprietario.
description.polish: Pierścień Bachusa wrócił do swojego pierwotnego właściciela.
description.russian: Кольцо Бахуса вернулось к своему владельцу
description.schinese: 巴克斯之戒回到了它的原主人身边
description.spanish: El anillo de Baco ha vuelto a manos de su dueño original.

description.brazilian: Você não é o único que joga o jogo do anel de Baco. Cuidado com outros!
description.czech: Hru na Bakchův prsten nehraješ jen ty, tak si dej dobrý pozor na ostatní!
description.english: You're not the only one playing the Ring of Bacchus game, so watch out for the others!
description.french: Vous n'êtes pas le seul à jouer à l'anneau de Bacchus. Prenez garde aux autres !
description.german: Du bist nicht der Einzige, der das Spiel um den Ring des Bacchus spielt, also sei auf der Hut!
description.italian: Non sei l’unico a giocare con l’anello di Bacco, quindi guardati le spalle!
description.polish: Nie jesteś jedyną osobą grającą w Pierścień Bachusa, więc uważaj na innych!
description.russian: Ты не единственный игрок охотник за Кольцом Бахуса, так что остерегайся остальных!
description.schinese: 你不是唯一一个在玩这个戒指游戏的人，所以小心其他人！
description.spanish: No solo tú juegas por el anillo de Baco, así que cuidado con los demás.
description.turkish: Bacchus'un Yüzüğü oyunun oynayan tek kişi sen değilsin, bunun için diğerleri konusunda dikkatli ol!

description.brazilian: Resgate todos os sobreviventes.
description.english: Rescue all the survivors.
description.french: Secourir tous les survivants.
description.german: Rette alle Überlebenden.
description.italian: Salva tutti i superstiti.
description.schinese: 拯救所有幸存者
description.spanish: Rescata a todos los supervivientes.

description.brazilian: Provoque um ferimento mortal em Henry!
description.english: Cause Henry a mortal wound!
description.french: Infliger une blessure mortelle à Henry !
description.german: Füge Heinrich eine tödliche Verletzung zu!
description.italian: Hai causato a Henry una ferita mortale!
description.schinese: 亨利遭受了致命一击
description.spanish: ¡Inflige a Henry una herida mortal!
description.turkish: Henry'nin ölümcül bir yara almasına sebep ol!

description.brazilian: Complete a história de Theresa.
description.english: Complete Theresa's story.
description.french: Terminer l'histoire de Thérèse.
description.german: Schließe Theresas Geschichte ab.
description.italian: Completa la storia di Theresa.
description.schinese: 完成特丽莎的剧情
description.spanish: Completa la historia de Theresa.

description.brazilian: Ignore suas tarefas matinais!
description.czech: Vykašli se na své ranní povinnosti.
description.english: Shirk your morning chores!
description.french: Vous avez esquivé vos corvées matinales.
description.german: Drücke dich vor deinen morgendlichen Pflichten.
description.italian: Adempi alle mansioni quotidiane!
description.polish: Wymigaj się od swych porannych obowiązków!
description.schinese: 早起旷工！
description.spanish: ¡Elude tus tareas matutinas!
description.turkish: Yan yatıp sabahlık ev islerinden kaytar!

description.brazilian: Recupere o tesouro de Pavel sem ser descoberto.
description.czech: Získej Pavlův poklad, aniž by tě zpozorovali.
description.english: Recover Pavel's treasure without being discovered.
description.french: Récupérer le trésor de Pavel sans être découvert par les Coumans.
description.german: Birg Pavels Schatz, ohne von den Kumanen entdeckt zu werden.
description.italian: Recupera il tesoro di Pavel senza essere scoperto.
description.polish: Odzyskaj skarb Pawła, nie zdradzając się.
description.russian: Верни сокровище Павла так, чтобы тебя не заметили.
description.schinese: 在没被人发现的情况下追回帕瓦尔的宝物
description.spanish: Recupera el tesoro de Pavel sin que te descubran.

displayName.french: Tu n'avais pas quelque chose à faire ?

description.brazilian: Beba para esquecer com Ambrose!
description.czech: Opij se s Ambrožem do němoty.
description.english: Drink yourself into oblivion with Ambrose!
description.french: Vous étiez censé jouer aux dés, pas passer votre temps aux latrines !
description.german: Betrinke dich mit Ambros bis zur Besinnungslosigkeit.
description.italian: Bevi fino allo sfinimento con Ambrose!
description.polish: Upij się do nieprzytomności z Ambrożym!
description.schinese: 和安布洛斯一起喝个酩酊大醉！
description.spanish: ¡Bebe hasta la inconsciencia con Ambrose!

description.brazilian: Veja o que Henslin tem nas ceroulas sem ser notado.
description.czech: Podívej se, co má Henslin v bruchách, aniž by si toho všiml.
description.english: See what Henslin has in his braies without being observed.
description.french: Voir ce qu'Henslin a dans les braies, sans être repéré.
description.german: Sieh unbemerkt nach, was Henslin in seiner Bruoch hat.
description.italian: Guarda nelle brache di Henslin senza essere visto.
description.polish: Po kryjomu rzuć okiem, co Henslin ma w swych portkach.
description.russian: Посмотри, что у Хенслина на животе, не будучи замеченным.
description.schinese: 在不被发现的情况下，看看亨斯林的衬裤里有什么
description.spanish: Averigua lo que tiene Henslin en los calzones sin que te observen.
description.turkish: Gözetlenmeden Henslin’in poturunda ne olduğuna bak.

description.brazilian: Tenha na consciência todos os pecados em que Johanka possa pensar.
description.czech: Buď tak hříšný, že ti Johanka vyčte všechny možné hříchy.
description.english: Have on your conscience every sin Johanka can think of.
description.french: Avoir sur la conscience tous les péchés auxquels Jeanne peut penser.
description.german: Begeh jede Sünde, die Johanka in den Sinn kommt.
description.italian: Pentiti di qualsiasi peccato Johanka ti accusi.
description.polish: Popełnij każdy grzech, o którym tylko Johanka może  pomyśleć.
description.russian: Соверши все грехи, которые сможет придумать Йоханка.
description.schinese: 犯下乔汉卡能想到的每一种罪
description.spanish: Carga sobre tu conciencia todos los pecados que se le ocurran a Johanka.
description.turkish: Vicdanında Johanka'nın düşünebileceği her günaha yer ver.

description.brazilian: A punição se adequa ao crime.
description.czech: Kdo s čím zachází, tím také schází.
description.english: The punishment fits the crime.
description.french: La punition est le reflet du crime.
description.german: Führe den Mörder seiner gerechten Strafe zu.
description.italian: Il castigo rifletta il crimine.
description.polish: Kto mieczem bojuje, od miecza ginie.
description.schinese: 为罪犯合理量刑
description.spanish: La pena es proporcional al castigo.

description.brazilian: Ajude a salvar Johanka da mais dolorosa acusação de heresia!
description.czech: Pomoz Johance očistit se od všech nařčení z kacířství!
description.english: Help save Johanka from the most grievous charge of heresy!
description.french: Sauver Jeanne de l'accusation d'hérésie afin qu'elle puisse vivre heureuse aux côtés de Matthias.
description.german: Trage dazu bei, dass Johanka beim Prozess glimpflich davonkommt.
description.italian: Difendi Johanka per salvarla dalla più atroce condanna dell’inquisitore!
description.polish: Uratuj Johankę od najcięższej kary za herezję!
description.russian: Помоги спасти Йоханку от самого тяжкого обвинения в ереси.
description.schinese: 让乔汉卡免遭最严重的异端者指控！
description.spanish: ¡Ayuda a salvar a Johanka del amargo cargo de herejía!
description.turkish: Johanka'yı sapkınlığın en ağır suçlamasından kurtarmaya yardım et!

description.brazilian: Comunique ao inquisidor todos os delitos que ocorrem na província.
description.czech: Nahlaš inkvizitorovi všechny možné zlořády, co se v kraji dějí.
description.english: Report to the Inquisitor all the wrongdoing going on in the province.
description.french: Accomplir votre devoir et signaler à l'inquisiteur toutes les transgressions de la région.
description.german: Berichte dem Inquisitor von allen Auffälligkeiten in der Provinz.
description.italian: Riferisci all’inquisitore ogni nefandezza perpetrata nella provincia.
description.polish: Donieś inkwizytorowi o wszystkich występkach w okolicy.
description.russian: Сообщай инквизитору обо всех проступках, совершаемых в провинции.
description.schinese: 将这一带所有的不法行为全部报告审判官
description.spanish: Informa al inquisidor de las fechorías que se suceden en la provincia.
description.turkish: Engizitörü ildeki bütün suistimaller hakkinda haberdar et.
